ygData.subject: Re: Casting Leering Corpse @ Lvl 9
ygData.msgSnippet: Following your logic, then Dark Elves should be able to cast Leering Corpse at level 9 (IF an ogre can do it). But why can Dark Elves not? If wisdom determines
ygData.messageBody:
Following your logic, then Dark Elves should be able to cast Leering Corpse
at level 9 (IF an ogre can do it). But why can Dark Elves not? If wisdom
determines the amount of mana SKs get, then why is it not one of our primary
attributes?



>Ok I think I'll shed some light on this subject. Intelligence is not how
>SK's mana is decided. Enchanters, Magicians, Necromancers, and Wizards mana
>are decided with Intelligence. For Clerics, Druids, Rangers, Shamans,
>Paladins, and Shadow Knights, Wisdom is the factor that decides the amount
of
>mana you get...Higher wisdom..earlier cast those spells at lvl 9. Hope this
>helps.
